verses.verse: And the second <WH8145> lot <WH1486> came <WH3318> forth <WH3318> to Simeon, <WH8095> even for the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Simeon <WH8095> according to their families: <WH4940> and their inheritance <WH5159> was within <WH8432> the inheritance <WH5159> of the children <WH1121> of Judah. <WH3063>
And they had in their inheritance <WH5159> Beersheba, <WH884> and Sheba, <WH7652> and Moladah, <WH4137>
And Hazarshual, <WH2705> and Balah, <WH1088> and Azem, <WH6107>
And Eltolad, <WH513> and Bethul, <WH1329> and Hormah, <WH2767>
And Ziklag, <WH6860> and Bethmarcaboth, <WH1024> and Hazarsusah, <WH2701>
And Bethlebaoth, <WH1034> and Sharuhen; <WH8287> thirteen <WH7969> <WH6240> cities <WH5892> and their villages: <WH2691>
Ain, <WH5871> Remmon, <WH7417> and Ether, <WH6281> and Ashan; <WH6228> four <WH702> cities <WH5892> and their villages: <WH2691>

And all <WH3605> the villages <WH2691> that were round <WH5439> about these <WH428> cities <WH5892> to Baalathbeer, <WH1192> Ramath <WH7418> of the south. <WH5045> This <WH2063> is the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Simeon <WH8095> according to their families. <WH4940>

Out of the portion <WH2256> of the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> was the inheritance <WH5159> of the children <WH1121> of Simeon: <WH8095> for the part <WH2506> of the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> was too much <WH7227> for them: therefore the children <WH1121> of Simeon <WH8095> had their inheritance <WH5157> within <WH8432> the inheritance <WH5159> of them.

And the third <WH7992> lot <WH1486> came <WH5927> up for the children <WH1121> of Zebulun <WH2074> according to their families: <WH4940> and the border <WH1366> of their inheritance <WH5159> was to Sarid: <WH8301>

And their border <WH1366> went <WH5927> up toward the sea, <WH3220> and Maralah, <WH4831> and reached <WH6293> to Dabbasheth, <WH1708> and reached <WH6293> to the river <WH5158> that is before <WH5921> <WH6440> Jokneam; <WH3362>

And turned <WH7725> from Sarid <WH8301> eastward <WH6924> toward the sun rise <WH4217> <WH8121> to the border <WH1366> of Chislothtabor, <WH3696> and then goes <WH3318> out to Daberath, <WH1705> and goes <WH5927> up to Japhia, <WH3309>
And from there <WH8033> passes <WH5674> on along on the east <WH6924> to Gittahhepher, <WH1662> to Ittahkazin, <WH6278> and goes <WH3318> out to Remmonmethoar <WH7417> to Neah; <WH5269>
And the border <WH1366> compasses <WH5437> it on the north <WH6828> side to Hannathon: <WH2615> and the outgoings <WH8444> thereof are in the valley <WH1516> of Jiphthahel: <WH3317>
And Kattath, <WH7005> and Nahallal, <WH5096> and Shimron, <WH8110> and Idalah, <WH3030> and Bethlehem: <WH1035> twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> cities <WH5892> with their villages. <WH2691>
This <WH2063> is the inheritance <WH5159> of the children <WH1121> of Zebulun <WH2074> according to their families, <WH4940> these <WH428> cities <WH5892> with their villages. <WH2691>
And the fourth <WH7243> lot <WH1486> came <WH3318> out to Issachar, <WH3485> for the children <WH1121> of Issachar <WH3485> according to their families. <WH4940>
And their border <WH1366> was toward Jezreel, <WH3157> and Chesulloth, <WH3694> and Shunem, <WH7766>
And Haphraim, <WH2663> and Shihon, <WH7866> and Anaharath, <WH588>
And Rabbith, <WH7245> and Kishion, <WH7191> and Abez, <WH77>
And Remeth, <WH7432> and Engannim, <WH5873> and Enhaddah, <WH5876> and Bethpazzez; <WH1048>

And the coast <WH1366> reaches <WH6293> to Tabor, <WH8396> and Shahazimah, <WH7831> and Bethshemesh; <WH1053> and the outgoings <WH8444> of their border <WH1366> were at Jordan: <WH3383> sixteen <WH8337> <WH6240> cities <WH5892> with their villages. <WH2691>
This <WH2063> is the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Issachar <WH3485> according to their families, <WH4940> the cities <WH5892> and their villages. <WH2691>
And the fifth <WH2549> lot <WH1486> came <WH3318> out for the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Asher <WH836> according to their families. <WH4940>
And their border <WH1366> was Helkath, <WH2520> and Hali, <WH2482> and Beten, <WH991> and Achshaph, <WH407>
And Alammelech, <WH487> and Amad, <WH6008> and Misheal; <WH4861> and reaches <WH6293> to Carmel <WH3760> westward, <WH3220> and to Shihorlibnath; <WH7884>

And turns <WH7725> toward the sun rise <WH4217> <WH8121> to Bethdagon, <WH1016> and reaches <WH6293> to Zebulun, <WH2074> and to the valley <WH1516> of Jiphthahel <WH3317> toward the north <WH6828> side <WH6285> of Bethemek, <WH1025> and Neiel, <WH5272> and goes <WH3318> out to Cabul <WH3521> on the left <WH8040> hand, <WH8040>
And Hebron, <WH2275> and Rehob, <WH7340> and Hammon, <WH2540> and Kanah, <WH7071> even to great <WH7227> Zidon; <WH6721>

And then the coast <WH1366> turns <WH7725> to Ramah, <WH7414> and to the strong <WH4013> city <WH5892> Tyre; <WH6865> and the coast <WH1366> turns <WH7725> to Hosah; <WH2621> and the outgoings <WH8444> thereof are at the sea <WH3220> from the coast <WH2256> to Achzib: <WH392>
Ummah <WH5981> also, and Aphek, <WH663> and Rehob: <WH7340> twenty <WH6242> and two <WH8147> cities <WH5892> with their villages. <WH2691>

This <WH2063> is the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Asher <WH836> according to their families, <WH4940> these <WH428> cities <WH5892> with their villages. <WH2691>
The sixth <WH8345> lot <WH1486> came <WH3318> out to the children <WH1121> of Naphtali, <WH5321> even for the children <WH1121> of Naphtali <WH5321> according to their families. <WH4940>

And their coast <WH1366> was from Heleph, <WH2501> from Allon <WH438> to Zaanannim, <WH6815> and Adami, <WH129> Nekeb, <WH5346> and Jabneel, <WH2995> to Lakum; <WH3946> and the outgoings <WH8444> thereof were at Jordan: <WH3383>

And then the coast <WH1366> turns <WH7725> westward <WH3220> to Aznothtabor, <WH243> and goes <WH3318> out from there <WH8033> to Hukkok, <WH2712> and reaches <WH6293> to Zebulun <WH2074> on the south <WH5045> side, and reaches <WH6293> to Asher <WH836> on the west <WH3220> side, and to Judah <WH3063> on Jordan <WH3383> toward the sun rise. <WH4217> <WH8121>
And the fenced <WH4013> cities <WH5892> are Ziddim, <WH6661> Zer, <WH6863> and Hammath, <WH2575> Rakkath, <WH7557> and Chinnereth, <WH3672>
And Adamah, <WH128> and Ramah, <WH7414> and Hazor, <WH2674>
And Kedesh, <WH6943> and Edrei, <WH154> and Enhazor, <WH5877>
And Iron, <WH3375> and Migdalel, <WH4027> Horem, <WH2765> and Bethanath, <WH1043> and Bethshemesh; <WH1053> nineteen <WH8672> <WH6240> cities <WH5892> with their villages. <WH2691>
This <WH2063> is the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Naphtali <WH5321> according to their families, <WH4940> the cities <WH5892> and their villages. <WH2691>
And the seventh <WH7637> lot <WH1486> came <WH3318> out for the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Dan <WH1835> according to their families. <WH4940>
And the coast <WH1366> of their inheritance <WH5159> was Zorah, <WH6881> and Eshtaol, <WH847> and Irshemesh, <WH5905>
And Shaalabbin, <WH8169> and Ajalon, <WH357> and Jethlah, <WH3494>
And Elon, <WH356> and Thimnathah, <WH8553> and Ekron, <WH6138>
And Eltekeh, <WH514> and Gibbethon, <WH1405> and Baalath, <WH1191>
And Jehud, <WH3055> and Beneberak, <WH1139> and Gathrimmon, <WH1667>
And Mejarkon, <WH4313> and Rakkon, <WH7542> with the border <WH1366> before <WH4136> Japho. <WH3305>

And the coast <WH1366> of the children <WH1121> of Dan <WH1835> went <WH3318> out too little for them: therefore the children <WH1121> of Dan <WH1835> went <WH5927> up to fight <WH3898> against <WH5973> Leshem, <WH3959> and took <WH3920> it, and smote <WH5221> it with the edge <WH6310> of the sword, <WH2719> and possessed <WH3423> it, and dwelled <WH3427> therein, and called <WH7121> Leshem, <WH3959> Dan, <WH1835> after the name <WH8034> of Dan <WH1835> their father. <WH1>

This <WH2063> is the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Dan <WH1835> according to their families, <WH4940> these <WH428> cities <WH5892> with their villages. <WH2691>

When they had made an end <WH3615> of dividing the land <WH776> for inheritance <WH5157> by their coasts, <WH1367> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> gave <WH5414> an inheritance <WH5159> to Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126> among <WH8432> them:

According <WH5921> to the word <WH6310> of the LORD <WH3068> they gave <WH5414> him the city <WH5892> which <WH834> he asked, <WH7592> even Timnathserah <WH8556> in mount <WH2022> Ephraim: <WH669> and he built <WH1129> the city, <WH5892> and dwelled <WH3427> therein.

These <WH428> are the inheritances, <WH5159> which <WH834> Eleazar <WH499> the priest, <WH3548> and Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun, <WH5126> and the heads <WH7218> of the fathers <WH1> of the tribes <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> divided for an inheritance <WH5157> by lot <WH1486> in Shiloh <WH7887> before <WH6440> the LORD, <WH3068> at the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation. <WH4150> So they made an end <WH3615> of dividing <WH2505> the country. <WH776>
